description: Know more about me in this page. I am a frontend software engineer, and this is my web workspace. Explore my projects, read my blog, and get in touch with me.

aboutMe.title: Who am I?
aboutMe.description:
I am Francisco Fernandes, a frontend software engineer who puts a lot of effort into creating beautiful and functional websites. Graduated in computer engineering at ISEP (Instituto Superior de Engenharia do Porto), I am also a passionate learner, and I am always looking for new ways to improve my skills.

I work/worked as a freelancer for several companies, working on mobile and web applications.

currentStatus.title: Current Status
currentStatus.position: Master's Student at ISEP and Freelancer
